mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOWSCHEDULE (SHOW_ID, MOVI_ID, HALL_ID, SHOW_DATE, SHOW_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_SHOW.NEXTVAL, #{movi_id}, #{hall_id}, #{show_date}, #{show_time})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(BOOK_ID) FROM BOOKSEAT WHERE SHOW_ID = #{show_id}
SELECT COUNT(BOOK_ID) FROM BOOK WHERE SHOW_ID = #{show_id}

SELECT S.SHOW_ID, S.SHOW_DATE, S.SHOW_TIME, M.MOVI_ID, M.MOVI_NAME, M.RUN_TIME AS END_TIME, H.HALL_ID, H.HALL_NAME, H.AVAI_SEAT_AMOUNT - (SELECT COUNT(BOOK_ID) FROM BOOKSEAT BS WHERE BS.SHOW_ID = S.SHOW_ID) AS REMA_AMOUNT, H.HALL_ROW * H.HALL_COL AS HALL_SEAT FROM SHOWSCHEDULE S INNER JOIN MOVIE M on S.MOVI_ID = M.MOVI_ID INNER JOIN HALL H on S.HALL_ID = H.HALL_ID
WHERE S.SHOW_ID = #{show_id}
